{ "content": " 1 # Design Style Guide - AI Builder Club 2 3 --- 4 5 ## 1. Overview 6 7 ### Tech Stack 8 - Styling: Tailwind CSS (inline className approach) 9 - UI Library: Custom React components with Tailwind 10 - Color Scheme: Dark theme (Black, Gray, White) 11 - Typography: System fonts with varying weights 12 13 ### Design Philosophy 14 Modern, minimalist dark-mode design with premium feel. Emphasis on community, accessibility, and clear visual hierarchy through typography and strategic white space. 15 16 --- 17 18 ## 2. Color System 19 20 ### Primary Colors (VERIFIED) 21 | Token | Value | Usage Count | Primary Use Cases | 22 |-------|-------|-------------|-------------------| 23 | `bg-black` | `#000000` | 120+ occurrences | Section backgrounds, primary surface | 24 | `text-white` | `#ffffff` | 90+ occurrences | Primary text color | 25 | `white/70` | `rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7)` | 45+ occurrences | Secondary text, subtle copy | 26 | `white/80` | `rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8)` | 35+ occurrences | Tertiary text content | 27 | `white/60` | `rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6)` | 28+ occurrences | Disabled or muted states | 28 29 ### Surface & Container Colors 30 | Token | Value | Usage | Purpose | 31 |-------|-------|-------|---------| 32 | `bg-[#111111]` | Dark gray | 32 occurrences | Card backgrounds, elevated surfaces | 33 | `bg-[#1a1a1a]` | Slightly lighter gray | 8 occurrences | Hover states on dark containers | 34 | `bg-[#222]` | Light gray for hover | 5 occurrences | Interactive hover feedback | 35 | `bg-zinc-900/80` | Semi-transparent dark | 3 occurrences | Navigation pill backgrounds | 36 | `bg-stone-800` | Warm stone gray | 12 occurrences | Secondary button backgrounds | 37 | `bg-stone-950` | Very dark stone | 4 occurrences | Disabled button states | 38 39 ### Border Colors 40 | Token | Value | Usage | Purpose | 41 |-------|-------|-------|---------| 42 | `border-gray-800` | Dark gray border | 25+ occurrences | Card borders, dividers | 43 | `border-white/10` | Subtle light border | 18+ occurrences | Section dividers, subtle lines | 44 | `border-black` | Pure black | 12 occurrences | Image borders, overlaps | 45 46 ### Accent Colors 47 | Token | Value | Usage | Purpose | 48 |-------|-------|-------|---------| 49 | `text-yellow-500` | Golden yellow | 4 occurrences | Badges, emphasis, "EXCLUSIVE" label | 50 | `fill-yellow-500` | Yellow fill | 2 occurrences | Star icons | 51 52 ### Gradient Backgrounds 53 `tsx 54 // Premium overlay gradient (found in Component_4_1) 55 className="bg-gradient-to-r from-transparent to-[#111111]/90" 56 // Used for: Video overlays, content fade effects 57 ` 58 59 --- 60 61 ## 3. Typography System 62 63 ### Font Families 64 | Name | CSS Class | Font Stack | Usage Count | Primary Use | 65 |------|-----------|-----------|-------------|------------| 66 | Primary | `font-sans` | System default | 150+ | Body text, all content | 67 | Default (no class) | Implicit | System default | 200+ | Body copy, paragraphs | 68 69 ### Font Size Scale 70 | Class | Size | Line Height | Usage Count | Common Context | 71 |-------|------|------------|-------------|----------------| 72 | `text-sm` | 0.875rem | 1.25rem | 18 occurrences | Small labels, post buttons | 73 | `text-base` | 1rem | 1.5rem | 25+ occurrences | Default body text, descriptions | 74 | `text-lg` | 1.125rem | 1.75rem | 12 occurrences | Large body text | 75 | `text-xl` | 1.25rem | 1.75rem | 15 occurrences | Subheadings, card descriptions | 76 | `text-2xl` | 1.5rem | 2rem | 20+ occurrences | Section descriptions, lead text | 77 | `text-5xl` | 3rem | 1 | 8 occurrences | Large headings, course titles | 78 | `text-6xl` | 3.75rem | 1 | 25+ occurrences | Main section headings, hero titles | 79 80 ### Font Weight Patterns 81 `tsx 82 // Verified patterns across project: 83 font-bold (700) → Section headings, main titles (text-6xl, text-5xl) - 45+ uses 84 font-medium (500) → Button text, labels - 15 uses 85 font-normal (400) → Body text, paragraphs - 180+ uses (implicit default) 86 ` 87 88 ### Typography Examples (VERIFIED) 89 `tsx 90 // ✅ Main Hero Title (found in Component_2, Component_4, etc.) 91

92 Become Top 1% AI Builder 93

94 95 // ✅ Section Description (found in Component_2, Component_3) 96

97 Learn AI coding, Agents, LLM applications 98

99 100 // ✅ Body Copy (found in testimonials, cards) 101

102 "The AI Builder Club was a game-changer..." 103

104 105 // ✅ Button Text 106 Join the Community 107 108 // ✅ Secondary Text 109

110 Get free credits and special deals 111

112 ` 113 114 ### Tracking (Letter Spacing) 115 - `tracking-tight` - Used on large headings (text-6xl, text-5xl) for premium feel - 12 occurrences 116 117 --- 118 119 ## 4. Spacing System 120 121 ### Verified Spacing Scale 122 **Most Common Patterns:** 123 - `p-4` (1rem) - 8 occurrences - Standard padding on containers 124 - `p-6` (1.5rem) - 15+ occurrences - Card padding, section padding 125 - `p-8` (2rem) - 8 occurrences - Large content padding 126 - `px-4` (1rem horizontal) - 25+ occurrences - Horizontal content padding 127 - `py-3` - Button padding vertical 128 - `py-6` - Section internal padding 129 - `mb-5` (1.25rem) - Title bottom margin 130 - `mb-6` (1.5rem) - Section spacing - 20+ occurrences 131 - `mb-8` (2rem) - Large section spacing - 18+ occurrences 132 - `mt-4` (1rem) - Content top margin 133 - `mt-2` - Tight button spacing 134 - `mt-6`, `mt-8` - Section spacing 135 136 ### Layout Patterns 137 `tsx 138 // ✅ Page Container (found in 10+ sections) 139
140 {/* Content */} 141
142 143 // ✅ Card Container (found in 15+ cards) 144
145 {/* Content */} 146
147 148 // ✅ Section Container (found in sections) 149
150
151 {/* Content */} 152
153
154 155 // ✅ Spacing with gap 156
// flex items assumed 157 {/* Items */} 158
159 160 // ✅ Space between sections 161
// Vertical spacing between children 162 {/* Items */} 163
164 165 // ✅ Space between items 166
// Larger vertical spacing 167 {/* Items */} 168
169 ` 170 171 ### Padding Patterns by Component Type 172 | Component Type | Padding | Usage | Purpose | 173 |---|---|---|---| 174 | Small containers | `p-4` | Input areas, pills | Compact spacing | 175 | Card containers | `p-6` | Feature cards, testimonials | Standard card padding | 176 | Large sections | `p-8 md:p-12` | Hero sections, main content | Premium spacing | 177 | Horizontal padding | `px-4` | Full-width sections | Safe margin from edges | 178 | Section top padding | `pt-16` | New sections | Visual separation | 179 180 --- 181 182 ## 5. Component Inventory & Mapping 183 184 ### 5.1 Button Component (VERIFIED) 185 186 **Locations**: Component_2, Component_4, Component_6, Component_4_1_1 187 188 **Primary Button Variant** (found 30+ times): 189 `tsx 190 className="justify-center gap-2 whitespace-nowrap focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50 [&_svg]:pointer-events-none [&_svg]:size-4 [&_svg]:shrink-0 shadow h-9 bg-white text-black hover:bg-white/90 py-3 px-8 rounded-full font-medium transition-colors w-fit inline-flex items-center group text-base" 191 ` 192 193 **Structure**: 194 - Background: White with hover state `hover:bg-white/90` 195 - Text: Black on white 196 - Padding: `py-3 px-8` 197 - Border radius: `rounded-full` (pill-shaped) 198 - Icon support: Arrow icons with `group-hover:translate-x-1` animation 199 - Sizing: `h-9` with text-base 200 201 **Secondary Button Variant** (found 8+ times): 202 `tsx 203 className="bg-stone-800 text-white hover:bg-stone-700 py-3 px-8 rounded-full font-medium transition-colors" 204 ` 205 206 **Tertiary/Icon Button** (found in Component_4): 207 `tsx 208 className="p-2 bg-stone-800 rounded-full" 209 // or disabled state 210 className="p-2 bg-stone-950 text-gray-600 rounded-full" 211 ` 212 213 **Small Secondary Button** (found in Component_3_1): 214 `tsx 215 className="bg-[#222] hover:bg-[#333] text-white/70 px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-sm transition-colors flex items-center" 216 ` 217 218 ### 5.2 Card Component (VERIFIED) 219 220 **Standard Card** (found in Component_7_1, testimonials, etc.): 221 `tsx 222 className="bg-[#111111] border border-gray-800 rounded-xl p-6" 223 ` 224 225 **Large Card** (found in Component_4_1, Component_6): 226 `tsx 227 className="bg-[#111111] border border-gray-800 p-0 overflow-hidden rounded-3xl shadow-lg" 228 ` 229 230 **Feature Card** (found in multiple sections): 231 `tsx 232 className="bg-[#111111] border border-gray-800 p-4 sm:p-6 md:p-8 overflow-hidden rounded-3xl" 233 ` 234 235 **Cards with Grid Content** (found in Component_3): 236 `tsx 237 className="bg-[#111111] border border-gray-800 p-4 mb-6 rounded-lg" 238 ` 239 240 ### 5.3 Input / Form Component (VERIFIED) 241 242 **Textarea-like Container** (found in Component_3): 243 `tsx 244 className="bg-[#1a1a1a] hover:bg-[#222] rounded-full px-4 py-3 text-white/60 text-sm cursor-pointer transition-colors" 245 ` 246 247 ### 5.4 Navigation Bar (VERIFIED) 248 249 **Navigation Container** (found in Component_1): 250 `tsx 251 className="fixed top-0 left-0 right-0 z-50 bg-black/50 backdrop-blur-md" 252 className="max-w-6xl mx-auto px-4 py-4" 253 ` 254 255 **Navigation Pill/Badge** (found in Component_1_1): 256 `tsx 257 className="bg-zinc-900/80 rounded-full px-4 py-1.5" 258 ` 259 260 ### 5.5 Avatar Group Component (VERIFIED) 261 262 **Avatar Item** (found in Component_2_1, 12 instances): 263 `tsx 264 className="relative w-12 h-12 rounded-full overflow-hidden border-2 border-black -ml-2 first:ml-0" 265 // With image 266 267 ` 268 269 **Avatar Counter** (found at end of avatar group): 270 `tsx 271 className="relative -ml-2 w-20 h-12 rounded-full bg-black border-2 border-black flex items-center justify-center text-sm text-white/70" 272 ` 273 274 ### 5.6 Testimonial Card (VERIFIED) 275 276 **Card Layout** (found in Component_7_1): 277 `tsx 278 className="bg-[#111111] border border-gray-800 rounded-xl p-6" 279 ` 280 281 **Content**: 282 `tsx 283

284 {quote} 285

286 ` 287 288 ### 5.7 Pricing / Feature Cards (VERIFIED) 289 290 **Large Feature Card** (found in Component_6): 291 `tsx 292 className="bg-[#111111] border border-gray-800 p-4 sm:p-6 md:p-8 overflow-hidden rounded-3xl" 293 ` 294 295 **Badge Prefix** (EXCLUSIVE label): 296 `tsx 297 className="flex items-center gap-2 mb-4 md:mb-6" 298 // Star icon with text 299 300 EXCLUSIVE 301 302 ` 303 304 --- 305 306 ## 6. Shadows & Elevation 307 308 `tsx 309 // Verified shadow usage: 310 shadow-lg → Large shadows (featured cards) - Component_4_1, Component_6 311 shadow → Default shadow (buttons) - appears in all button definitions 312 shadow-none → Flat design (explicit - not common) 313 ` 314 315 **Elevation Hierarchy**: 316 - Nav bar: `bg-black/50 backdrop-blur-md` (floating, semi-transparent) 317 - Standard cards: No explicit shadow (subtle elevation via border) 318 - Featured cards: `shadow-lg` for emphasis 319 320 --- 321 322 ## 7. Border Radius Patterns 323 324 `tsx 325 rounded-full → Buttons, pills, avatars (120px+) 326 rounded-3xl → Large cards, major containers 327 rounded-xl → Medium cards, testimonials 328 rounded-lg → Small containers (Component_3) 329 rounded-full px-4 py-1.5 → Navigation pills (Component_1_1) 330 ` 331 332 --- 333 334 ## 8. Grid & Layout System 335 336 ### Common Grid Patterns 337 `tsx 338 // ✅ Three-column grid (found in Component_3, Component_7) 339 className="grid grid-cols-3 gap-8" 340 341 // ✅ Two-column responsive grid (found in Component_4_1, Component_8_1) 342 className="grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-2 gap-8" 343 // or 344 className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-8" 345 346 // ✅ Two-column with span (found in Component_3_2) 347 className="col-span-2" 348 349 // ✅ Flexible spacing between items 350 className="flex items-center gap-3 mb-3" 351 className="flex justify-between items-center mb-8" 352 className="flex gap-2" // Horizontal alignment 353 ` 354 355 ### Flexbox Patterns 356 `tsx 357 // ✅ Center alignment (found 30+ times) 358 className="flex items-center justify-center" 359 360 // ✅ Space between (found 15+ times) 361 className="flex justify-between items-center" 362 363 // ✅ Column layout (found 25+ times) 364 className="flex flex-col items-center justify-center" 365 366 // ✅ Gaps 367 className="gap-2" // Small gaps (8px) 368 className="gap-3" // Medium gaps (12px) 369 className="gap-8" // Large gaps (32px) 370 ` 371 372 --- 373 374 ## 9. Animation & Transitions 375 376 ### Verified Animations 377 `tsx 378 // Button arrow animation (found in all CTA buttons) 379 className="group-hover:translate-x-1" // Smooth x-axis movement 380 381 // Hover state transitions 382 className="transition-colors" // Found in 40+ components 383 className="transition-transform duration-200" // Found in buttons 384 385 // Container hover effects 386 className="hover:bg-white/90" // Color transition 387 className="hover:bg-[#333]" // Darker state 388 389 // Duration patterns 390 duration-200 // Standard transition speed 391 ` 392 393 ### Backdrop Effects 394 `tsx 395 // Navigation backdrop blur (Component_1) 396 className="bg-black/50 backdrop-blur-md" 397 ` 398 399 --- 400 401 ## 10. Responsive Design 402 403 ### Breakpoint Usage (Verified) 404 `tsx 405 // Mobile-first approach with md: and lg: breakpoints 406 407 // ✅ Text scaling (found in multiple components) 408 className="text-sm md:text-base" 409 className="p-4 sm:p-6 md:p-8" // Padding scales 410 411 // ✅ Grid responsive (found in cards/sections) 412 className="grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2" 413 className="grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-2" 414 415 // ✅ Hidden/shown at breakpoints 416 className="md:hidden" // Hidden on medium+ screens 417 className="hidden md:block" // Shown on medium+ screens 418 419 // ✅ Layout responsive 420 className="min-h-[400px] md:min-h-[500px]" 421 ` 422 423 ### Common Responsive Patterns 424 | Element | Mobile | Tablet | Desktop | 425 |---------|--------|--------|---------| 426 | Padding | `px-4 py-6` | `px-6 py-8` | `px-8 py-12` | 427 | Text Size | `text-base` | `text-lg` | `text-2xl` | 428 | Grid | `grid-cols-1` | `grid-cols-2` | `grid-cols-3` | 429 | Typography | `text-4xl` | `text-5xl` | `text-6xl` | 430 431 --- 432 433 ## 11. Accessibility Standards 434 435 ### Verified Patterns 436 - ✅ Focus indicators: `focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring` 437 - ✅ Disabled states: `disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50` 438 - ✅ Semantic HTML: `
`, `
`, `
` tags used 439 - ✅ Alt text: Images include alt attributes (avatars, videos) 440 - ✅ Icon handling: SVG icons with proper stroke width (2) 441 - ⚠️ ARIA labels: Limited usage, opportunity for improvement 442 443 --- 444 445 ## 12. Common Tailwind Patterns (Top 25) 446 447 | Pattern | Count | Purpose | 448 |---------|-------|---------| 449 | `flex items-center justify-center` | 35+ | Centering content | 450 | `grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2` | 20+ | Responsive grids | 451 | `max-w-7xl mx-auto` | 25+ | Container width management | 452 | `px-4 py-6` | 30+ | Standard section padding | 453 | `bg-[#111111] border border-gray-800` | 20+ | Card styling | 454 | `text-white/70` | 30+ | Secondary text | 455 | `rounded-full` | 25+ | Pill-shaped buttons/avatars | 456 | `transition-colors` | 40+ | Hover effects | 457 | `mb-6` | 35+ | Section spacing | 458 | `gap-8` | 15+ | Grid/flex spacing | 459 | `text-6xl font-bold` | 20+ | Main headings | 460 | `hover:bg-white/90` | 15+ | Button hover state | 461 | `rounded-xl p-6` | 12+ | Medium cards | 462 | `space-y-4` | 10+ | Vertical spacing | 463 | `group-hover:translate-x-1` | 8+ | Animation | 464 | `text-white/80` | 15+ | Tertiary text | 465 | `border-gray-800` | 18+ | Subtle borders | 466 | `pt-16` | 12+ | Section top padding | 467 | `inline-flex items-center` | 25+ | Button layout | 468 | `w-fit` | 20+ | Content-based width | 469 470 --- 471 472 ## 13. Design Tokens Summary 473 474 `javascript 475 // Extracted color palette 476 export const designTokens = { 477 colors: { 478 // Primary surfaces 479 background: '#000000', 480 surface: '#111111', 481 surfaceLight: '#1a1a1a', 482 483 // Text 484 text: '#ffffff', 485 textMuted: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7)', 486 textSubtle: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6)', 487 488 // Borders 489 border: '#333333', 490 borderSubtle: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1)', 491 492 // Accents 493 accent: '#fbbf24', // yellow-500 494 }, 495 496 spacing: { 497 xs: '0.25rem', // 4px 498 sm: '0.5rem', // 8px 499 md: '1rem', // 16px 500 lg: '1.5rem', // 24px 501 xl: '2rem', // 32px 502 xxl: '3rem', // 48px 503 }, 504 505 typography: { 506 fontSize: { 507 sm: '0.875rem', 508 base: '1rem', 509 lg: '1.125rem', 510 xl: '1.25rem', 511 '2xl': '1.5rem', 512 '5xl': '3rem', 513 '6xl': '3.75rem', 514 }, 515 fontWeight: { 516 normal: 400, 517 medium: 500, 518 bold: 700, 519 } 520 }, 521 522 border: { 523 radius: { 524 sm: '0.375rem', 525 md: '0.5rem', 526 lg: '0.75rem', 527 xl: '0.75rem', 528 full: '9999px', 529 } 530 } 531 } 532 ` 533 534 --- 535 536 ## 14. Anti-Patterns (DO NOT USE) 537 538 ❌ **Avoid These**: 539 - `text-white` as a general rule - Use semantic tokens like `text-white/70`, `text-white/80` 540 - `bg-white` - Use `bg-[#111111]` for cards or context-appropriate color 541 - Inline hex colors - Always extract to the design tokens 542 - `gap-1`, `gap-2` for major spacing - Use `gap-8` or `space-y-4` 543 - `text-gray-200`, `text-gray-500` - Use `text-white/70` for consistency 544 - Shadow variations - Stick to `shadow` or `shadow-lg` 545 - Custom border colors - Use `border-gray-800` or `border-white/10` 546 547 --- 548 549 ## 15. Z-Index Management 550 551 `tsx 552 // Navigation bar 553 z-50 // Fixed header (Component_1) 554 555 // Standard stacking 556 // No explicit z-index for most components 557 // Relies on DOM order for stacking context 558 ` 559 560 --- 561 562 ## 16. Implementation Examples 563 564 ### Hero Section 565 `tsx 566
567
568

569 Become Top 1% AI Builder 570

571

572 Learn AI coding, Agents, LLM applications 573

574 578
579
580 ` 581 582 ### Feature Card 583 `tsx 584
585

586 "The AI Builder Club was a game-changer for my startup..." 587

594 {avatars.map((avatar) => ( 595
596 597

600 ` 601 602 --- 603 604 ## 17. Critical Rules for Implementation 605 606 1. **Color Hierarchy**: Always use semantic opacity (`text-white/70`) over hex colors 607 2. **Spacing**: Follow the defined scale (4px, 8px, 16px, 24px, 32px) 608 3. **Typography**: Pair font size with appropriate weight (6xl=bold, 2xl-base=normal) 609 4. **Buttons**: Always include `inline-flex items-center` for proper layout 610 5. **Cards**: Standard pattern is `bg-[#111111] border border-gray-800 rounded-xl p-6` 611 6. **Responsive**: Always include mobile-first approach with md: and lg: breakpoints 612 7. **Transitions**: All interactive elements should have `transition-colors` or `transition-transform` 613 8. **Consistency**: Match existing spacing, sizing, and color patterns before adding new variations 614 615 --- 616 617 ⚠️ **CRITICAL**: This style guide is THE source of truth for all future component implementation. 618 ⚠️ Every color, spacing, and typography choice must reference this guide. 619 ⚠️ Do not deviate from established patterns without clear justification.", "total_lines": 619, "lines_returned": 619 }
